name: acid
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.
